item.title: System Of A Down - B.Y.O.B.
item.description:
Why do they always
send the poor
Barbarisms by Barbaras
with pointed heels
Victorious
victories kneel
For brand new
spankin’ deals
Marching forward
hypocritic and
Hypnotic
computers
You depend on
our protection
Yet you feed us lies
from the tablecloth
Ra ra ra ra ra
ra ra ra ra ra
Everybody’s going
to the party
Have a real
good time
Dancing
in the desert
Blowing up
the sunshine
Kneeling roses
disappearing into
Moses’ dry mouth
breaking into
Fort knox stealing
our intentions
Hangers sitting
dripped in oil
Crying freedom
handed to obsoletion
Still you feed us lies
from the tablecloth

ra ra ra ra ra

to the party

good time

in the desert

the sunshine

the sunshine

And we don’t live
in a fascist nation

it’s party time

the xuck are you

fight the war

item.title: System Of A Down - Chop Suey
item.description:
Wake up
grab a brush
And put a little
makeup
Hide the scars
to fade away
The shakeup
why’d you leave
The keys
upon the table?
Here you go create
another fable
You wanted to
grab a brush
And put a little
makeup
You wanted to
hide the scars
To fade away
the shakeup
You wanted to
why’d you leave
The keys
upon the table?
You wanted to
I don’t think
You trust
in my self
Righteous suicide
I cry
When angels
deserve to die

father father
